title: This Week's Top Stories - The FBI Nabs Capitol Rioters, Joe Biden's Inauguration & The NBA Bans Hugs
itunes:title: This Week's Top Stories - The FBI Nabs Capitol Rioters, Joe Biden's Inauguration & The NBA Bans Hugs
description:
The FBI tracks down Capitol rioters through social media posts, Joe Biden becomes America's 46th president, and the NBA imposes no-hugging rules to curb the spread of COVID-19.


Please visit dailyshow.com/FirstRespondersFirst to help provide medical and psychological treatment for first responders on the front lines of fighting COVID

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
